projects.title: Restaurant Food App
projects.description: Production-ready backend system for restaurant management with secure authentication and order handling.
projects.longDescription: Built a comprehensive restaurant management system using modern web technologies. The application features secure JWT-based authentication, role-based access control, and a complete REST API for managing menus, restaurants, carts, and orders. Implemented with MVC architecture for maintainability and deployed to production with cloud database integration.

projects.title: Social Media Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive dashboard for analyzing user engagement metrics with real-time data visualization.
projects.longDescription: Developed a comprehensive analytics dashboard that processes and visualizes social media engagement data. Features include interactive charts, customizable date ranges, real-time updates, and detailed reporting capabilities. Built with a focus on performance and user experience, handling large datasets efficiently.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with payment integration and admin dashboard.
projects.longDescription: Comprehensive e-commerce platform featuring user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, payment processing, and administrative tools. Implemented with modern React patterns, responsive design, and secure backend APIs.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: Collaborative task management tool with real-time updates and team features.
projects.longDescription: Built a modern task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, real-time collaboration, team management, and progress tracking. Features include customizable workflows, deadline management, and comprehensive reporting.
